verses.verse: And I <S%G3708>looked,<s%> and <S%G2400>behold,<s%> the <S%G721>Lamb<s%> [was] <S%G2476>standing<s%> on <S%G3735>Mount<s%> <S%G4622>Zion,<s%> and with Him <S%G1540>one<s%> <S%G1540>hundred<s%> and forty-four <S%G5505>thousand,<s%> <S%G2192>having<s%> His <S%G3686>name<s%> and the <S%G3686>name<s%> of His <S%G3962>Father<s%> <S%G1125>written<s%> on their <S%G3359>foreheads.<s%>

And I <S%G191>heard<s%> a <S%G5456>voice<s%> from <S%G3772>heaven,<s%> <S%G5613>like<s%> the <S%G5456>sound<s%> of <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G5204>waters<s%> and <S%G5613>like<s%> the <S%G5456>sound<s%> of <S%G3173>loud<s%> <S%G1027>thunder,<s%> and the <S%G5456>voice<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> I <S%G191>heard<s%> [was] <S%G5613>like<s%> [the sound] of <S%G2790>harpists<s%> <S%G2789>playing<s%> on their <S%G2788>harps.<s%>

And they <S%G103>sang<s%> a <S%G2537>new<s%> <S%G5603>song<s%> <S%G1799>before<s%> the <S%G2362>throne<s%> and <S%G1799>before<s%> the <S%G5064>four<s%> <S%G2226>living<s%> <S%G2226>creatures<s%> and the <S%G4245>elders;<s%> and <S%G3762>no<s%> <S%G3762>one<s%> <S%G1410>could<s%> <S%G3129>learn<s%> the <S%G5603>song<s%> <S%G1508>except<s%> the <S%G1540>one<s%> <S%G1540>hundred<s%> and forty-four <S%G5505>thousand<s%> who had been <S%G59>purchased<s%> from the <S%G1093>earth.<s%>

<S%G3778>These<s%> are the ones <S%G3739>who<s%> have not been <S%G3435>defiled<s%> with <S%G1135>women,<s%> for they have kept <S%G1510>themselves<s%> <S%G3933>chaste.<s%> <S%G3778>These<s%> [are] the ones who <S%G190>follow<s%> the <S%G721>Lamb<s%> <S%G3699>wherever<s%> <S%G302><s%> He <S%G5217>goes.<s%> <S%G3778>These<s%> have been <S%G59>purchased<s%> from <S%G575>among<s%> <S%G444>men<s%> as <S%G536>first<s%> <S%G536>fruits<s%> to <S%G2316>God<s%> and to the <S%G721>Lamb.<s%>
And <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G5579>lie<s%> was <S%G2147>found<s%> in their <S%G4750>mouth;<s%> they are <S%G299>blameless.<s%>

And I <S%G3708>saw<s%> <S%G243>another<s%> <S%G32>angel<s%> <S%G4072>flying<s%> in <S%G3321>midheaven,<s%> <S%G2192>having<s%> an <S%G166>eternal<s%> <S%G2098>gospel<s%> to <S%G2097>preach<s%> to <S%G3588>those<s%> who <S%G2521>live<s%> on the <S%G1093>earth,<s%> and to <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G1484>nation<s%> and <S%G5443>tribe<s%> and <S%G1100>tongue<s%> and <S%G2992>people;<s%>

and he <S%G3004>said<s%> with a <S%G3173>loud<s%> <S%G5456>voice,<s%> <S%G5399>"Fear<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> and <S%G1325>give<s%> Him <S%G1391>glory,<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> the <S%G5610>hour<s%> of His <S%G2920>judgment<s%> has <S%G2064>come;<s%> and <S%G4352>worship<s%> Him who <S%G4160>made<s%> the <S%G3772>heaven<s%> and the <S%G1093>earth<s%> and <S%G2281>sea<s%> and <S%G4077>springs<s%> of waters."

And <S%G243>another<s%> <S%G32>angel,<s%> a <S%G1208>second<s%> <S%G1208>one,<s%> <S%G190>followed,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G4098>"Fallen,<s%> <S%G4098>fallen<s%> is <S%G897>Babylon<s%> the <S%G3173>great,<s%> she <S%G3739>who<s%> has <S%G4222>made<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G1484>nations<s%> <S%G4222>drink<s%> of the <S%G3631>wine<s%> of the <S%G2372>passion<s%> of her <S%G4202>immorality.<s%>"

And <S%G243>another<s%> <S%G32>angel,<s%> a <S%G5154>third<s%> <S%G5154>one,<s%> <S%G190>followed<s%> them, <S%G3004>saying<s%> with a <S%G3173>loud<s%> <S%G5456>voice,<s%> <S%G1487>"If<s%> <S%G5100>anyone<s%> <S%G4352>worships<s%> the <S%G2342>beast<s%> and his <S%G1504>image,<s%> and <S%G2983>receives<s%> a <S%G5480>mark<s%> on his <S%G3359>forehead<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> upon his <S%G5495>hand,<s%>

he <S%G2532>also<s%> will <S%G4095>drink<s%> of the <S%G3631>wine<s%> of the <S%G2372>wrath<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> which is <S%G2767>mixed<s%> in <S%G194>full<s%> <S%G194>strength<s%> in the <S%G4221>cup<s%> of His <S%G3709>anger;<s%> and he will be <S%G928>tormented<s%> with <S%G4442>fire<s%> and <S%G2303>brimstone<s%> in the <S%G1799>presence<s%> of the <S%G40>holy<s%> <S%G32>angels<s%> and in the <S%G1799>presence<s%> of the <S%G721>Lamb.<s%>

"And the <S%G2586>smoke<s%> of their <S%G929>torment<s%> <S%G305>goes<s%> up <S%G165>forever<s%> and <S%G165>ever;<s%> and they <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G372>rest<s%> <S%G2250>day<s%> and <S%G3571>night,<s%> <S%G3588>those<s%> who <S%G4352>worship<s%> the <S%G2342>beast<s%> and his <S%G1504>image,<s%> and <S%G1487>whoever<s%> <S%G5100><s%> <S%G2983>receives<s%> the <S%G5480>mark<s%> of his <S%G3686>name.<s%>"
<S%G5602>Here<s%> is the <S%G5281>perseverance<s%> of the <S%G40>saints<s%> who <S%G5083>keep<s%> the <S%G1785>commandments<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> and their <S%G4102>faith<s%> in <S%G2424>Jesus.<s%>

And I <S%G191>heard<s%> a <S%G5456>voice<s%> from <S%G3772>heaven,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G1125>"Write,<s%> <S%G3107>'Blessed<s%> are the <S%G3498>dead<s%> who <S%G599>die<s%> in the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> from <S%G737>now<s%> on!'" <S%G3483>"Yes,<s%>" <S%G3004>says<s%> the <S%G4151>Spirit,<s%> "that they may <S%G373>rest<s%> from their <S%G2873>labors,<s%> for their <S%G2041>deeds<s%> <S%G190>follow<s%> with them."

And I <S%G3708>looked,<s%> and <S%G2400>behold,<s%> a <S%G3022>white<s%> <S%G3507>cloud,<s%> and <S%G2521>sitting<s%> on the <S%G3507>cloud<s%> [was] <S%G3664>one<s%> <S%G3664>like<s%> a <S%G5207>son<s%> of <S%G444>man,<s%> <S%G2192>having<s%> a <S%G5552>golden<s%> <S%G4735>crown<s%> on His <S%G2776>head,<s%> and a <S%G3691>sharp<s%> <S%G1407>sickle<s%> in His <S%G5495>hand.<s%>

And <S%G243>another<s%> <S%G32>angel<s%> <S%G1831>came<s%> out of the <S%G3485>temple,<s%> <S%G2896>crying<s%> out with a <S%G3173>loud<s%> <S%G5456>voice<s%> to Him who <S%G2521>sat<s%> on the <S%G3507>cloud,<s%> <S%G3992>"Put<s%> in your <S%G1407>sickle<s%> and <S%G2325>reap,<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> the <S%G5610>hour<s%> to <S%G2325>reap<s%> has <S%G2064>come,<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> the <S%G2326>harvest<s%> of the <S%G1093>earth<s%> is <S%G3583>ripe.<s%>"
And He who <S%G2521>sat<s%> on the <S%G3507>cloud<s%> <S%G906>swung<s%> His <S%G1407>sickle<s%> <S%G1909>over<s%> the <S%G1093>earth;<s%> and the <S%G1093>earth<s%> was <S%G2325>reaped.<s%>

And <S%G243>another<s%> <S%G32>angel<s%> <S%G1831>came<s%> out of the <S%G3485>temple<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> is in <S%G3772>heaven,<s%> and he <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G2192>had<s%> a <S%G3691>sharp<s%> <S%G1407>sickle.<s%>

And <S%G243>another<s%> <S%G32>angel,<s%> the one who <S%G2192>has<s%> <S%G1849>power<s%> <S%G1909>over<s%> <S%G4442>fire,<s%> <S%G1831>came<s%> out from the <S%G2379>altar;<s%> and he <S%G5455>called<s%> with a <S%G3173>loud<s%> <S%G5456>voice<s%> to him who <S%G2192>had<s%> the <S%G3691>sharp<s%> <S%G1407>sickle,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G3992>"Put<s%> in your <S%G3691>sharp<s%> <S%G1407>sickle,<s%> and <S%G5166>gather<s%> the <S%G1009>clusters<s%> from the <S%G288>vine<s%> of the <S%G1093>earth,<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> her <S%G4718>grapes<s%> are <S%G187>ripe.<s%>"

And the <S%G32>angel<s%> <S%G906>swung<s%> his <S%G1407>sickle<s%> to the <S%G1093>earth,<s%> and <S%G5166>gathered<s%> [the clusters from] the <S%G288>vine<s%> of the <S%G1093>earth,<s%> and <S%G906>threw<s%> them into the <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G3025>wine<s%> <S%G3025>press<s%> of the <S%G2372>wrath<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>

And the <S%G3025>wine<s%> <S%G3025>press<s%> was <S%G3961>trodden<s%> <S%G1855>outside<s%> the <S%G4172>city,<s%> and <S%G129>blood<s%> <S%G1831>came<s%> out from the <S%G3025>wine<s%> <S%G3025>press,<s%> up to the horses' <S%G5469>bridles,<s%> for a <S%G575>distance<s%> of <S%G1812>two<s%> hundred <S%G4712>miles.<s%>
